description:
This superlight, expedition proven pack is made for alpine climbing in the harshest environments on the planet. The Stache 60 is a highly capable, versatile multi-day pack featuring the high-tech fabrics and attention to detail that Blue Ice is known for. Load it up for epic approaches, then strip it down for the summit bid by removing the lid, frame and framesheet.

  • Made of durable 210-denier nylon with UHMWPE ripstop that is ultra-resistant to UV present at higher altitudes
  • Low-profile but highly structured carry system handles heavy loads
  • Frame, framesheet and lid can be removed to achieve its summit weight of 600g
  • Removable lid doubles as a basecamp essentials case
  • Compression straps for load management or securing a sleeping mat or snow picket
  • Internal sleeve can be used for a hydration bladder, oxygen cylinder
  • Dual dog-bone tool attachments with large toggle adjusters that are easy to use while wearing gloves
  • A-frame ski carry
  • Reflective details for alpine starts
  • Hydration port and webbing hose loops. (Reservoir sold separately)
name: Blue Ice Stache 60 Backpack - Unisex
